alert.note: Alert for Sawtooth, Stanley Basin (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued June 12 at 2:46PM MDT until June 13 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WATCH FOR THE BOUNDARY FIRE BURN SCAR REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding and debris flows caused by excessive rainfall continue to be possible over the Boundary Fire burn scar. * WHERE...A portion of central Idaho, including the following area, Sawtooth/Stanley Basin. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall over the Boundary Fire burn scar is expected during the period of the watch. Residents near the Boundary Fire burn scar should prepare for potential flooding impacts. Be sure to stay up to date with information from local authorities. Heavy rainfall could trigger flash flooding of low-lying areas, urbanized street flooding, and debris flows in and near recent wildfire burn scars. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - National Weather Service Meteorologists are forecasting heavy rainfall over the burn scar, which may lead to flash flooding and debris flows. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
